OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

PaymentsForAffordableHousingPrograms.label: Payments for Affordable Housing Programs
PaymentsForAffordableHousingPrograms.description: Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.label: Payments for Origination of Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationOfMortgageLoansHel.description: The amount of cash paid for the origination of mortgages that are held for sale.

PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.description: The net cash paid (received) associated with the acquisition or disposal of all investments, including securities and other assets.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLifeInsurancePoli.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Life Insurance Policies
PaymentsForProceedsFromLifeInsurancePoli.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for net proceeds and payments derived from carrying life insurance policies for which the entity is the beneficiary.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherRealEstatePa.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Real Estate Partnerships
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherRealEstatePa.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from other real estate partnerships not otherwise defined in the taxonomy (buyouts, other agreements).

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLoansReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection, including prepayments, of loans receivable issued for financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Proceeds from Life Insurance Policy
ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstateHeldfor.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstateHeldfor.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate held for investment not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromSaleOfTradingSecuritiesHeldf.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfTradingSecuritiesHeldf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

RealEstateInvestmentsOther.label: Real Estate Investments, Other
RealEstateInvestmentsOther.description: Amount of real estate owned for income production and capital accretion potential, not otherwise specified in the existing taxonomy. Such real estate excludes that which is occupied or used in the business, for entertainment purposes, or held in inventory for specific purposes.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, before Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedStockExpense.label: Restricted Stock or Unit Expense
RestrictedStockExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.label: Securities Received as Collateral
SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Issued in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanAlloc.label: Shares Held in Employee Stock Option Plan, Allocated
SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanAlloc.description: Number of allocated shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Allocated shares are shares that have been assigned to individual participant accounts based on a known formula.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.label: Short-term Debt, Average Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtAverageOutstandingAmount.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, average borrowings during the period.

ShorttermDebtMaximumMonthendOutstandingA.label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtMaximumMonthendOutstandingA.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, maximum month-end borrowings during the period.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Adjusted Balance (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interests, after the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncomeTaxExpenseB.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from effect of Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsLessThan100000.label: Time Deposits, Less than $100,000
TimeDepositsLessThan100000.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of less than $100,000.

TransferOfOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer from Real Estate Owned
TransferOfOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockRetiredCostMethodAmount.label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Cost Method, Amount
TreasuryStockRetiredCostMethodAmount.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the cost method.

TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount.label: Treasury Stock, Retired, Par Value Method, Amount
TreasuryStockRetiredParValueMethodAmount.description: Amount of decrease of par value, additional paid in capital (APIC) and retained earnings of common and preferred stock retired from treasury when treasury stock is accounted for under the par value method.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.label: Advances from Federal Home Loan Banks
AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Gain (Loss), Net
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.
